name: Bananaguy
description:
You know what would be cool? A banana in gold of course! :O And so Bananaguy set out to find the legendary golden banana...

Bananaguy is about exploring goofy and playful worlds collecting "Power Coins" along the way which are used to travel to new worlds. Each coin features its own little bizzare adventure.

Content

  • Three colorful, funny and diverse worlds with goofy ahh inhabitants, nonsensical adventures and many secrets
  • 80+ Power Coins to collect! Each one offering a unique experience!
  • Banan! :O
